description:
The Google Chrome Developer Tools are built into the Google Chrome web browser. Google have produced a stable, fast, feature rich browsing experience for end users but they didn't stop there. Google has also ensured that developers like you have a great experience with Chrome too.

The Developer Tools, bundled in Chrome, allows web developers and programmers deep access into the internals of the browser and their web application.

This course is focused on giving a fast introduction to making the very best use of the Dev Tools and cover each Dev Panel showing the most popular and useful, features.

The target audience ranges from the casual user who wants to take a peak behind the curtains of a web page through to experienced web developers who do not know of, or have not yet experienced, the Developer Tools.
title: Google Chrome Developer Tools
